thread.title: Professor Gets Unexpected Interruption During Live News Broadcast That Is Absolutely Hilarious

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Professor Gets Unexpected Interruption During Live News Broadcast That Is Absolutely Hilarious
text:
Professor Gets Unexpected Interruption During Live News Broadcast That Is Absolutely Hilarious   
There was an unexpected distraction for Professor Robert Kelly when he was being interviewed live on BBC News about South Korea and the impeachment of their present. But he somehow managed to keep his composure and complete the interview successfully. Leave it to children to put everything in perspective, even serious news events! 
Share this hilarious news blooper with your family and friends!   Like Us On Facebook!
